page.title: 18EDUCATION
page.content: Theres about nine different types of schools and only three are compulsory. First school-which teaches you how to read,write and play the recorder. Middle school-which teaches English, Science,Maths etc.Secondary school- which teaches you more complicated subjects.These are the only schools you{have}to go to.All the others are where you go out of choice.Now with unemployment so high most people go to at least one of the places of Further Education so they have more chance of getting a job. Education has greatly improved but I think it will change and become a lot better eg:The use of more personal computers,More individual work rather than class work.Maybe even a computer teaching you and not a person. Maybe even in the comfort of your own home not at school.
